feed.title: autobrr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.56.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • d153ac44b83d9499f54ebf69d88b95478a56e119: feat(filters): RED and OPS fetch record label from API (#1881) (@s0up4200)
  • ea20fb4f50e4f6a5e733e678256e7d750a36a9e0: feat(filters): set default Announce Type to NEW (#1890) (@zze0s)
  • 4009554d10165b10ca7d705fff1bf576e9bf2a30: feat(filters): skip duplicates (#1711) (@kenstir)
  • 221bc35371ec90326bf2105bcdecbed94d3e64dc: feat(lists): integrate Omegabrr (#1885) (@zze0s)
  • 9ae798c99ac797f3b72ef54a65641bfea04e09d8: feat(macros): add MetaIMDB (#1891) (@zze0s)

Bug fixes

  • 2c0672f4bcc57cc3256cf3106ec0cc29d20ea58c: fix(indexers): PTP update IRC channel (#1889) (@zze0s)
  • 0cf704dba3d1f004a3e17de69b8093281b813393: fix(releases): add null handling for new fields (#1892) (@zze0s)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.55.0...v1.56.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.56.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.56.1
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 79f8a98e738cad2f36e62ee0b94eb1547ad9c51e: feat(indexers): implement AnimeWorld announce types (#1900) (@martylukyy)
  • c13844e8b0a44146be12639705d9752b96f06c40: feat(lists): ui enhancements (#1898) (@fabricionaweb)

Bug fixes

  • 6b4f1d9f637ce00b3357029bdc5a5b850dd709a8: fix(database): migrations to update PTP IRC channel (#1906) (@zze0s)
  • 7bb3487e5ef356e27c1cd8e16959bcfafa42ffbc: fix(lists): handle NULL clientID for non-arr lists on Postgres (#1904) (@zze0s)
  • 0104ca4a28d755ee4d9defb8c658c09450641845: fix(lists): plaintext only accept URLs (#1901) (@s0up4200)
  • c1c97d2d97761ba2a5d41bb6158e5bc8e32b2580: fix(lists): toggle toast message (#1897) (@s0up4200)
  • af3907df9be5b3d9c159f1c8b45f7dafbf893517: fix(releases): handle NULL hybrid field (#1905) (@zze0s)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.56.0...v1.56.1

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.56.1

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.57.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 50820e6374c1b3f3ba15ad73a41f99c29782e617: feat(indexers): MAM filter VIP with release tags (#1932) (@zze0s)
  • 49534a4d32118c9ad762760495733990b53ebbc8: feat(indexers): remove TSC (#1917) (@martylukyy)
  • 338bcf38bb593d9b83d99b40c28b5023715751ae: feat(releases): improve collections/website/streaming service parsing (#1923) (@zze0s)

Bug fixes

  • edd89f23e948975c8d5a701ba632f217889b0857: fix(filters): truncate rejections on debug level (#1933) (@zze0s)
  • f9a74d9b2ee9db4123b98db9e8c4059bf770fa86: fix(indexers): Fuzer parse full category (#1922) (@zze0s)
  • 40c5462df9d91cc38fe71b38e0d0aeaa444486bf: fix(lists): improve parsing and exclude unwanted characters (#1918) (@zze0s)
  • 2bb6956b080e7da38e260bcf5ea12da52fed18f1: fix(web): typos in duplicate release profile settings (#1924) (@martylukyy)

Other work

  • 3e8ed10e81350770ae4005e29ce6f16d10ba08fc: build(deps): bump autobrr/go-rtorrent to v1.12.0 (#1925) (@zze0s)
  • 433c1248f453e2a82470cdc56b281bf3af5b5871: build(deps): bump the golang group with 9 updates (#1915) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 986979205a7740118cff4b1453fd59f2609f1f74: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 10 updates (#1916) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 039162986261b64dac94fc372152432217509457: chore(license): update copyright year in headers (#1929) (@s0up4200)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.56.1...v1.57.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.57.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.58.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • 024371e4eb877d9cabd8d9479540525bb7459fe8: feat(auth): add option to disable built-in login when using OIDC (#1908) (@s0up4200)
  • b724429b9763e5665f0068eb514b814159edf590: feat(lists): add anilist support (#1949) (@fabricionaweb)
  • 3f8bc0140cadc61e0842b60164fb1f96c0ec00ca: feat(metrics): add metrics server (#1930) (@Intuinewin)
  • 5e2769639fecea528951d478c0aa94a484f9b90c: feat(web): upgrade to tailwind v4 (#1946) (@martylukyy)

Bug fixes

  • f3082864842c32f3956b5d27e89a28d9eb55b92c: fix(feeds): handle unicode escaped url characters (#1942) (@s0up4200)
  • 9eff694a5f15036fd4a8a681db1890b1be716f04: fix(notifications): update and list password (#1951) (@zze0s)

Other work

  • 0d5902c8f6c68d87cd1654b408d08569c3e13ebc: build(make): improve install command (#1945) (@fabricionaweb)
  • b2be5a703f71349eea36d10b543fba31c47ab8b6: chore(indexers): remove PolishSource (#1943) (@tebowy)
  • 25574446f7e739d7d73f4dc79338b9616e1ba50c: chore(license): update copyright year in headers (#1935) (@s0up4200)
  • aef62a93a6bbdd400c8baca754ad6a7b3e0446ee: docs(cli): add manpage (#1940) (@s0up4200)
  • 79d0d6e572e6d662414c5421386d6f9b96be67d1: docs: improve freeleech detection in parsing (#1934) (@s0up4200)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.57.0...v1.58.0

Docker images

  • docker pull ghcr.io/autobrr/autobrr:v1.58.0

What to do next?

  • Read the documentation
  • Join our Discord server

entry.title: New release for autobrr: v1.59.0
entry.content:
Changelog

New Features

  • dd0fb5e8621b64f5dabaf5efdd1af842f42f5984: feat(indexers): add CapybaraBR (#1978) (@a1Thiago)
  • 5b7268da223acda6b7f15af23ccfa5c975c2a29c: feat(indexers): add HDB parse Exclusive as tag (#1969) (@martylukyy)
  • 21958291a54a5dcf48f20dfa561f9193e0002a9f: feat(indexers): add NordicQuality (#1954) (@martylukyy)
  • 9495fe08246f1efa3347103027aa0c16d91cf406: feat(indexers): add new FL mirror (#1979) (@fabricionaweb)

Bug fixes

  • 4fbaa0b72c138d85e9bf089a802daef19b59526f: fix(indexers): fuzer regex pattern (#1964) (@martylukyy)
  • 9017606b2d75bcbb770fec1dabaf442138068f95: fix(web): IRC network status gaps (#1959) (@martylukyy)
  • af2b9ef8b3556a7e7d317a7f4400d437678f9bd2: fix(web): border opacities (#1961) (@martylukyy)
  • 745606dacc7047311d54cf0cc6831b3c202b9967: fix(web): notification form checkboxes (#1956) (@martylukyy)

Other work

  • c8fbb32d2945a160daafae2d2f13391c4beadb90: build(deps): bump the golang group with 12 updates (#1958) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 1dd30137955537b21b22f2945ae7c9f1526ba1c8: build(deps): bump the golang group with 13 updates (#1981) (@dependabot[bot])
  • 33d7d75597c14cd769d44a7f3a55ddd0c886be66: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 18 updates (#1957) (@dependabot[bot])
  • c83f86b0fa592878a90dc77f6506b40676ca49ee: build(deps): bump the npm group in /web with 18 updates (#1982) (@dependabot[bot])
  • b4d3d18f4004f57028268c1ac03cef4b8904107c: docs(filters): fix tooltips (#1976) (@kenstir)
  • 06229edb5561cb42dde960b9b0157237c5acbcce: docs(indexers): update MAM cookie help text (#1968) (@locke69321)
  • ac0b4072550be2a0d822cf9c454f27f91c367ed8: refactor(config): remove mapstructure from OIDC (#1973) (@s0up4200)
  • 6e77f0339b728af28cdfb801d4864c02d40a3c55: refactor(lists): title character filtering (#1955) (@martylukyy)
  • e581d140664070c1af9f47ff489c9b909a83823b: refactor(lists): title variation processing (#1965) (@nuxencs)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autobrr/autobrr/compare/v1.58.0...v1.59.0
